meanings.definition: Harmony or elegance in design or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The concinnity of the garden's layout was truly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The concinnity of the furniture in the room made it feel cozy.
meanings.sent3: The concinnity of the mismatched chairs at the table was surprisingly charming.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit had a concinnity that seemed to flow effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The concinnity of the music and the dance created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The skillful and harmonious arrangement or fitting together of the different parts of something.
meanings.sent1: The concinnity of the puzzle pieces was impressive.
meanings.sent2: The concinnity of the gears in the clock allowed it to work perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The concinnity of the ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The concinnity of the team's strategies led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: The concinnity of the colors in the painting created a striking visual impact.
